about: A passionate software developer with a strong focus on delivering high-quality applications. Experienced in building innovative solutions that enhance user experience and business efficiency. Adept at working in dynamic environments, collaborating with teams, and continuously learning to improve and adapt to new challenges. Specialized in Flutter development and eCommerce applications with expertise in mobile and web platforms.

projects.title: Ataa-Electrician eCommerce App
projects.description_short: A Flutter-based eCommerce application for electricians to browse and purchase products from vendors.
projects.description_long: The Ataa eCommerce Electrician App is a Flutter-based application inspired by the modular eCommerce project. It allows electricians to browse and purchase products from vendors, view products, add items to their cart, complete the checkout process, and earn points from vendors. This app is part of a two-app system, with the other app designed for vendors to manage their products and services.

projects.title: Maria Taxi - Ride Hailing Platform
projects.description_short: A comprehensive taxi and transportation service with customer and driver applications.
projects.description_long: The Maria Taxi project comprises two Flutter applications: one for customers and the other for drivers. The customer application enables users to request a taxi, view available bus trips, book seats, and access tourism bus services. The driver application allows drivers to accept taxi ride requests, manage bus trips, and update trip details. Additionally, the project includes a school bus service, which is currently under development.

projects.title: EpiHope - Medical Management Platform
projects.description_short: An application designed to assist epilepsy patients and doctors in managing health information and medications.
projects.description_long: EpiHope is an application designed to assist epilepsy patients and doctors in managing health information and medications. It includes two main sections: the Doctor's Portal for accessing research articles, and the Patient's Portal for tracking health episodes and managing medications. The project also features an Admin Dashboard built with Next.js for content management.

projects.title: Fashion - Modular eCommerce Platform
projects.description_short: A modular eCommerce platform designed to simplify and streamline the development of eCommerce applications.
projects.description_long: Fashion is a modular eCommerce platform designed to simplify and streamline the development of eCommerce applications. It consists of a wide range of customizable plugins that can be easily turned on or off, allowing developers to create diverse variations of eCommerce apps tailored to specific business needs. The platform provides flexibility and scalability for various business requirements.

projects.title: Invoice Management System
projects.description_short: A comprehensive system for managing invoices, billing, and payments with admin panel.
projects.description_long: Created a comprehensive Invoice Management App & Admin Panel system for managing invoices, billing, and payments. The application provides features for creating, tracking, and managing invoices, with secure payment processing and detailed reporting capabilities. Built with Flutter for cross-platform compatibility and seamless performance.

projects.title: Home-Working Platform
projects.description_short: A platform for connecting freelancers with job opportunities with comprehensive admin panel.
projects.description_long: Developed a Home-Working App & Admin Panel platform for connecting freelancers with job opportunities. The application provides features for job posting, freelancer profiles, project management, and secure communication between clients and freelancers. Built with Flutter ensuring cross-platform compatibility and optimal performance across devices.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Specialized in eCommerce applications, building scalable solutions for online businesses. Developed and maintained applications for both mobile and web platforms. Built and contributed to several admin dashboards, implementing CRUD operations. Integrated Google Maps and tracking functionalities for real-time location services. Worked on delivery and logistics solutions, enhancing route optimization and live tracking. Integrated payment methods such as Zain Cash and other online payment gateways for seamless transactions. Ensured secure payment processing and compliance with industry standards.

experience.title: Flutter Developer
experience.description: Designed, developed, and deployed Mobile apps using Flutter. Created Invoice Management App & Admin Panel system for managing invoices, billing, and payments. Developed Home-Working App & Admin Panel platform for connecting freelancers with job opportunities. Ensured cross-platform compatibility and seamless performance across devices. Implemented authentication, data management, and backend integrations. Collaborated with teams to align business logic with front-end development.

education.description: Advanced studies in web technologies, software engineering principles, and modern development practices. Focus on web science methodologies and cutting-edge technologies in software development.

Comprehensive study of network engineering principles, computer systems, and software development fundamentals. Strong foundation in computer networks, system administration, and software engineering practices.
